description: Schema of all properties of a View event

loading_time.description: Duration in ns to the view is considered loaded

loading_type.description: Type of the loading of the view

time_spent.description: Time spent on the view in ns

first_contentful_paint.description: Duration in ns to the first rendering

dom_complete.description: Duration in ns to the complete parsing and loading of the document and its sub resources

dom_content_loaded.description: Duration in ns to the complete parsing and loading of the document without its sub resources

dom_interactive.description: Duration in ns to the end of the parsing of the document

load_event.description: Duration in ns to the end of the load event handler execution

action.description: Properties of the actions of the view

count.description: Number of actions that occurred on the view

error.description: Properties of the errors of the view

count.description: Number of errors that occurred on the view

long_task.description: Properties of the long tasks of the view

count.description: Number of long tasks that occurred on the view

resource.description: Properties of the resources of the view

count.description: Number of resources that occurred on the view

document_version.description: Version of the update of the view event
